question: Would you rather live without music OR without movies?
Would you rather be perfectly fine without eating OR perfectly fine without sleeping?
Would you rather lose the ability to speak OR lose the ability to hear?
Would you rather be the best singer in the world OR the best dancer in the world?
Would you rather take amazing selfies but look terrible in all other photos OR be photogenic everywhere except your selfies?
Would you rather win $10,000 OR your friend wins $100,000?
Would you rather be the funniest person in the room OR the smartest person in the room?
Would you rather your church know all your text messages OR see your entire photo gallery?
Would you rather never interact with people in-person OR electronically/online?
Would you rather have more money OR have more time?
Would you rather be a master of all instruments OR a master of all sports?
Would you rather have a personal maid OR a personal chef?
Would you rather get punished for a crime you did not commit OR someone else get credit for one of your major accomplishments?
Would you rather see a year into the future OR change a past life event? (both only once)
Would you rather spend the next 6 months: meeting people non-stop OR meet nobody?
Would you rather have your dream job OR your dream house?
(Think of your favourite food) Would you rather be required to eat it for every meal OR never eat it again?
Would you rather only raise dogs OR only raise cats?
Would you rather have unlimited international first-class tickets OR never have to pay for food at restaurants?
Would you rather always be 15 minutes late OR always be two hours early?
Would you rather be famous for something embarrassing OR never be recognized for anything?
Would you rather always know when someone is lying OR always get away with lying?
Would you rather live 100 years in the past OR 100 years in the future?
Would you rather live one life that lasts 1,000 years OR 10 lives that last 100 years each?
Would you rather have to sing every time you talk OR dance every time you walk?
Would you rather forget your past OR never be able to make new memories?
Would you rather always have the best Wi-Fi connection OR unlimited phone battery?
Would you rather spend a year in a small cozy cabin OR a month in a luxury mansion?
Would you rather have free access to every movie ever made OR every video game ever created?
Would you rather never use social media again OR never watch another TV show/movie?
Would you rather be known for your kindness OR your intelligence?
Would you rather live your entire life in one city OR move to a new city every week?
